lender.name: Sundog
lender.loan_because:
"The Little Boy and the Starfish"
One fine warm day, an old man was walking down a sandy, tropical beach. He noticed as he was walking that the tide had brought in a lot of starfish. He started looking at the starfish and admiring their pretty colors as he walked.
He noticed a little boy in the distance was walking towards him, but at a very slow pace.
The reason for the slow pace of the little boy became apparent the closer the old man came. The little boy was also looking at the starfish, but he was doing more. He was picking up those he found and throwing them back out to sea.
"Why are you throwing the starfish back into the sea?" asked the old man. "Starfish die if they're out of their sea water for too long." replied the little boy.
Ever the practical man, he said, "It's a good thing to do, but do you know how many starfish there must be washed up on this beach every day? You can't possibly make a dent in that. What difference can you make in an effort to save starfish?"
The little boy bent down, picked up another starfish, threw it out into the sea, turned towards the old man, and said, "It made a difference to that one."
lender.occupational_info: Microcredit, or small loans to the world's poorest people, is booming and now benefits more than half a billion people, a survey said yesterday (Dec. 18/07), but Africa and Latin America lag behind Asia and unscrupulous lenders are cashing in. The Microcredit Summit Campaign (http://www.microcreditsummit.org/) surveyed more than 3,000 microcredit bodies around the world, from small banks to community groups, and found they reported reaching 133 million people by the end of 2006, 92 million of them earning less than a dollar a day.

It is highly impressive and I support and respect these entrepreneurs on the Kiva website, who are taking charge and have the initiative to make their goals and dreams come true, and I am very happy to help enable them on their journey in some small way financially.

lender.occupational_info: I work to help keep older people healthy and safe in their communities.

lender.occupational_info: I design buildings. My son is a High School student.

lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Denise M.

lender.name: Choi Sim

lender.occupational_info: Mother, jewelry designer, church musician, fat chick, geek, pilot, Smith grad

lender.name: Erica and Frank
lender.loan_because: we have come to realize just how important it is to give in any form to others in our community, whether it be our personal, local, or global community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school English teacher and Frank is an assistant engineer in a power plant that makes steam as an energy source.

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: Help others who need it. It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: IT Security training

lender.name: Kristina
lender.loan_because: Everyone of us can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I teach pre-kindergarten children with learning disabilities.

lender.name: Spencer Family
lender.occupational_info: I stay home with my two young children.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: good businesses - however small - bring great blessings to people, communities and countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and companies with their inventions.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and want to give back to others that work hard but need a helping hand.

lender.name: Julio and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate and wish to share that with others.
lender.occupational_info: Jen works with people to put together fun parties with good food and great music. Julio creates delicious meals that look as wonderful as they taste!

lender.name: Damon
lender.loan_because: we want to honor the late Jo-Ann Latif Smith and believe startup capital should be available to anyone with the determination to succeed and the courage to fail despite their best efforts (and then hopefully try it again). So that our girls will understand the world is bigger than their backyard.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies reduce their cost to ship goods from one place to another within the United States.

lender.name: William
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies on how to grow their business and optimize operations.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I can...it's right
lender.occupational_info: I drive clients where they need to go providing luxury transportation and international trips.

lender.name: Jim & Robin
lender.occupational_info: We are a retired couple living in Michigan and have been blessed by God with more than we need. We hope this money will bless others.

lender.name: Jack & Katie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Museum School Kids
lender.loan_because: We are studying about how to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in a public elementary charter school in San Diego that is a part of the Children's Museum.

lender.name: Leah & Josiah
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women take care of their familes.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: God has provided for my family and I would like to bless others as he has done for mine.

lender.name: Natalia
lender.loan_because: After traveling around the world, I have been amazed at the spirit and determination of people trying to make a positive change for themselves, their family and their community.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I have seen the difference a "hand up" can make in the lives of determined individuals and I am honored to be able to share my good fortune helping to make their lives prosperous and independent
lender.occupational_info: Import and distribute fine teas grown and packaged by my business partner in Sri Lanka to the gourmet, grocery, food service and gift segments in North, Central, South America & the Caribbean

lender.name: Jenesa & Morgan
lender.loan_because: I am a single mom who is truly blessed. I love the idea that I can make a small difference and give a little something back.. Just knowing I am helping a mother in need, is worth more than any dollar amount I could possibly give.
lender.occupational_info: Everyone deserves a chance to make their dreams a reality.

lender.name: Crazy Monkey Defense
lender.loan_because:
We loan because many of us at the CMDPi know what it is like to have great ideas, but no one to help us make them a reality.
Many of us where told that our ideas where a waste of time and would never amount to anything- we are proving them wrong....and we want to help other people prove their critics wrong as well....we are here to help!
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of socially conscious Performance Enhancement Coaches, that use a martial arts based program, to help people deal with their anger, manage their stress and discover themselves again through the expression of their body.

lender.name: Remy & Zeus
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Microsoft

lender.name: Yasmeen
lender.loan_because: though it is only a small amount, I know the impact will be profound and together as one unit, Kiva, we can help unite the world. One loan at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer/Graduate of Business Administration

lender.name: Kimmy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling of making a contribution to someones success, when they would maybe have otherwise been unable to recieve financial help.

lender.name: mandy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: ernan
lender.loan_because: I want to put surveying company with three group as start up since dubai uae is booming in construction.
lender.occupational_info: I survey specially in building and construction

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: It is a way of making a difference

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: In 2001-02 I was a volunteer in Mombasa, Kenya, and every day I saw a disabled man pedalling a rickety homemade cart across a treacherous crossroads with his hands. He was a cobbler and worked on a street corner. I was overwhelmed by his determination and tenacity. Around that time he received a microcredit loan and later I saw him featured on a TV documentary, talking with pride about being better able to provide for his family despite being unable to walk. That's when I stopped putting it off and found Kiva. We all share the same planet, how can we afford not to help each other?!
lender.occupational_info: I work in conservation - helping to protect the reef & rainforest in north east Australia and find a balance between use and non-use.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to give a helping hand for budding entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Mining Industry

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: International Development

lender.name: Hollywoodalaska
lender.loan_because: * I have been where some of them are financially... * It takes so little to help * There is ALWAYS someone more in need than I am * Makes you feel good to do good * Do unto others what you would have done to / for you *Why Not?
lender.occupational_info:
Tour Bus driving in the summer, temporary [City] Borough Bus driving now, hopefully to become full time in the future.
I have 5 sons. As sole support for the boys, money has always been an issue. First husband died, 2nd owes over $75,000 child support. I opened a children's clothing shop w/ very little money years ago, it got us through. Work towards your dreams, have faith in yourself , pray and don't give up. : )

lender.name: Maggie
lender.occupational_info: I work with schools to help them plan the installation and use of computer software to help the school deliver service to students and faculty.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it's quite easy and it helps people getting small loans easily, too

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people to do things to improve their life's , I think this will be a good way to give things back to help others
lender.occupational_info: I am General Manager for a restaurant

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: no man is an island unto himself

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I want people to have better lives and the opportunity to help themselves and their families
lender.occupational_info: I write books for children and young people.

lender.name: The Evans Girls
lender.loan_because: We are lucky that we can. We believe that if we all did something, whatever you can afford, the world would be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homemaker & my daughter is a 6th grader. We choose our loans together.

lender.name: Tino
lender.loan_because: Helping others gives me a joy of life. I like to empower those in need to become powerful people.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy to know that I can help to make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Swapna and Navneet
lender.loan_because: We feel that we can make a difference in the lives of many with our small contributions

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel less powerless when I read the newspaper. And it connects me to people in Iraq and other countries affected by the U.S. military through actions I disagree with.
lender.occupational_info: I make theatre and work with playwrights to produce their scripts.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I like helping others and this is a great way to get to them.
lender.occupational_info: I help folks in the USA establish home businesses.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have always been incredibly blessed. And I am a firm believer in the "GIRL EFFECT". I often think, "What would my life be like if I was not so fortunate?" I am not a world traveler, but I am aware that there is much suffering on the planet . I can only hope that my loan helps to alleviate some of that misery by giving hard working people a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife, mother and professional artist every moment of every day. I am proud to help my husband support our family by selling the various artworks I create.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I believe that eradicating poverty is the best way to change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small hospital and offer comfort and education to people suffering all types of illnesses.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I think capitalism is the key to freedom and peace.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and now have an opinion column in a newspaper and write books.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want people who have the drive to also have the means to succeed.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro-credit. I believe that people with resources have a duty to give those without finance to support and grow their lives
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Unix Analyst / Database Manager for a UK charity.

lender.name: Wilma
lender.loan_because: I like to see people get a chance to build something for themselves, when there are few opportunities available to them.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the money in a television program production unit.

lender.name: The Murphy Family
lender.loan_because: We are grateful that we can.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want a safer world for my children and I want to earn money
lender.occupational_info: I try to establish just paiments within the administration

lender.name: Jonah
lender.loan_because: Our School Community believes that helping people help themselves is the best way to build a better world. I am investing profit that we made in our school store as directed by our community congress.

lender.name: bulkpeppercorns.com
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: We buy, repackage, and sell all kinds of spices.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I believe that every person deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to give as much as I was given.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference for others.
lender.occupational_info: I help others starting new businesses.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to live in a country where hard work and education can lead to financial rewards for me and my family. I want to share my money with others in the world to encourage freedom and improve the living conditions in their countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am married with 2 children. I work as a medical doctor treating sick and injured patients in the emergency room of a busy hospital.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: The micro loans can break the cycle of poverty. They give someone the chance to better their standard of living and provide for education of their children. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make jewelry which I sell at art shows and art and craft shows. I also teach fencing and substiture teach at local schools.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: Team Leader in the struggling auto industry. We build small cars for the world- Calibers, Compasses and Patriots.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I like to help hard-working people who try to improve their lives.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I belong to the community. I benefit from the community. I owe the community. I want my children to share the community with people who have opportunities to be successful. I want people to feel successful because they can be self-sufficient.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I have travelled a great deal and love the idea of helping people help themselves....

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: To much that is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Magdalena & Simon
lender.loan_because: We like helping people reach their goals.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: I believe that the money in my bank account is God's, not mine.
lender.occupational_info: Currently studying Biology, Chemistry and Physics at college.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinancing. I believe people want to make their own way if at all possible. I hope I help in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach cultural anthropology and sociology, two subjects that are about people, sameness and differences, and learning to love both.

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: I don't want lack of money to stand in the way of someone reaching a goal and doing what they love to better their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, sewer and have a small sewing business specializing in children's clothing and products.

lender.name: Judi
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become more independent!

lender.occupation: Airlines, Screen printing, embroidery and more
lender.loan_because: I have never had anyone to help me.
lender.occupational_info: Airlines load lots of bags get very little pay.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: a little makes a lot of difference.
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage a small construction company specializing in office and retail shop interiors

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help along the way...pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I create Home decor with vintage textiles of the 50's, 60's and 70's....the mood is Mod

lender.name: James Patterson
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage industrious individuals to be successful in earning an adequate living.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired as a teacher of elementary students. Most years were spent with students 2nd to 6th grade.

lender.loan_because: I have been given much, I too must give.

lender.name: Roel

lender.occupational_info: I hel[p people buy and sell houses.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: We all need to help in each other -everywhere, in any way we can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes and apartments in Fort Lauderdale. The picture is me and my beautiful grandson, Austin.

lender.name: Lauren and Scott
lender.occupational_info: children's doctor and computer programmer

lender.name: Emil
lender.loan_because: Jesus Said: "But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well."

lender.name: Isabel & Jonathan
lender.loan_because: This is a great program! It allows us to help people willing to work. Another way to make a difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: Life long learners, love to travel and the outdoors.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I'm starting my own business and would like to help others grow their businesses as I grow mine.

lender.name: CIndy
lender.loan_because: The compounding affect of giving a hand up. And You'll never see a hearse pulling a U-Haul

lender.name: Check-Six.com

it's people helping people - Powerful stuff!
We also enjoy helping with that "final push" towards raising the needed capital, especially to those in the Transportation sector.
lender.occupational_info: Check-Six.com offers aviation history and adventure first-hand...

lender.name: Janna
lender.loan_because: It makes an impact to others. I know that my money is being used for a great cause. I have had my own business helped by loans and want to help in return.
lender.occupational_info: I am a very nice taxi. I drive a big black SUV. I take people to and from the airport, from their home to restaurants and back, and sometimes they rent my time by the hour to take them and their friends to a concert or a sports game. My business is like a limousine.

lender.name: MERRY GALE & MARIN
lender.loan_because: At this time in our lives my husband & I feel blessed and abundant and want to share our financial abundance with others.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I want to help to give others the same opportunities that I have had to be successful.

lender.name: Dorian and Morgen
lender.occupation: IT technician and public health professional
lender.loan_because: We received this as a wonderful wedding gift.

lender.name: Eileen and Bill
lender.loan_because: I want to share some of God's good graces bestowed on me and mine.
lender.occupational_info: Retired Adm Supervisor of 400 bed hospital. Married 52 years with 2 sons and 2 granddaughters, great grand daughter and one grandson.

lender.name: Annahita
lender.loan_because: I like helping out the less fortunate. I have received many gifts in my life and I enjoy giving back.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I Can, and you should!
lender.occupational_info: I own a sales company and I manage the people that work for my company

lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jeannine
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to see someone build a successful enterprise, one that will support themselves and their family!

lender.name: ANGELA
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lender.name: Don & Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe in pay back.
lender.occupational_info: I am the COO of a charity that has helped southwest Native American students get an education for over 40 years.

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, on a computer answering phones for a newspaper.

lender.name: Lois
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I raise two young girls.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: I design buildings which are good for the people in them and the environment.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do right now!
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use computers/software for manufacturing medicines.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility
lender.occupational_info: attracting new students to attend college so they can better their career opportunities

lender.name: Karuana
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a better life for yourself. I'm happy to help someone else in their work to live a better life. We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to make better decisions for their family and relationships.

lender.name: Laurence
lender.loan_because: I believe that it does good. People need a chance to show what they can do for themselves.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping one another is a path to world peace.
lender.occupational_info: I teach government workers technical writing and ethics, especially about using their authority wisely.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to as many people as possible. Just a small way to give back for all that I have been given in life.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: No one deserves to suffer because of where or to whom they were born. Only when the global community comes together to relieve each other of the day-to-day struggle of living can we even begin to make true human progress.My mother is a refugee from Cambodia and my parents toiled to raise me. I feel like contributing to others helps me repay the debt I owe to them, and as a way to help other children grow up in safe, nurturing communities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a pre-medical student in California.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: every person deserves an opportunity to pursue a dream.
lender.occupational_info: Mom to a baby girl

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: My father was a cowboy, caring for cattle. I loan in memory of him, who helped so many.
lender.occupational_info: I like learning, about anything but especially about how things work in other countries. I am amazed at the ingenuity of humankind in figuring out ways to better themselves and their families and honored to be able to enable some people to realize their dreams.

lender.name: Noelle
lender.loan_because: We all need each other to live.
lender.occupational_info: I'm part of the airplane team who helps people to travel around the world.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because:
I can and have been enabled to do so.
"We are the generation that can, therefore we are the generation that must." (Bono)
but more importantly:
"Do not withold good from those who deserve it, when it is in your power to act." -Proverbs 3:27
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Clemson University student, but more importantly, I am a Christ Follower who has been blessed far beyond what I could ever imagine or certainly deserve. God has given me the life he has for a reason and has enabled me to serve others, so I will. I am so blessed to be able to serve and glorify Him, especially in such a capacity as this.

lender.name: Jung-chieh
lender.loan_because: Try to be good

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: there is need and Kiva.org seems like an effect way to make positive change happen faster.
lender.occupational_info: Analyze risk associated lending company's money.

lender.name: Carlos
lender.loan_because: The best way to help people is to help them stand on their own and be productive.
lender.occupational_info: I help big companies organize their information.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: who wouldn't?
lender.occupational_info: a student

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: (1) it is the right thing to do. (2) It is good fortune that I have the education and resources that I have; therefore I need to share them.(3) I want to be a silent stakeholder in the businesses I help so I can watch them grow and celebrate their success.
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading and study skills to first year college students helping them make the adjustment from high school to college

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: So they can have a business that works well and provides money to their families
lender.occupational_info: I've been involved in Pace University's Model Montessori UN (MMUN) program. The picture of me was taken in the UN general assembly hall.

lender.name: TERESA
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to raise a family

lender.name: Kenji Iwase
lender.loan_because: Payback for the people who helped me and my wife during travel all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: Now I impotr US soybeans (for tofu), wheat and Cnadian canola (for crush).

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: Without other people's helping hands, I would not be where I am today.
lender.occupational_info: I make the technical functions of software understandable to the sales team, press and analyst.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: People deserve a chance to better themselves/ situations!
lender.occupational_info: I sell Beauty Products ( Shampoo, Styling Products and Salon Equipment to Salons )

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to do good things and help the world economy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a U.S. Marine.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to see God's redemptive work around the world, and figure this a good way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help cities run better.

lender.name: Mark Holmes
lender.loan_because: The world is a better place when everyone has a chance to follow their dreams. My experiences living in Guatemala taught me that $25 can mean the difference between eating or not.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer in the medical billing industry.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: These borrowers pay back their loans at a FAR greater rate than borrowers at any bank in the United States. I have made hundreds of loans and have not had a single default. I believe that my loans are really helping to make a difference in the lives of these people.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Because it's a great way to make a worth while investment in a persons life. It's an honor to be able to partner with someone who is pursuing a dream, goal or simply looking for an avenue to better care for themselves and their family,
lender.occupational_info: My company provides Marketing and Management solutions designed for small and medium size businesses. I also speak on the subject of economic development.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people who want to help themselves all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have difficulty with communication.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It's the type of charity that keeps on giving.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses grow through connecting buyers and sellers online.

lender.name: Meredith
lender.loan_because:
it's the right thing to do. Knowing that the money is going directly to the people in need makes it feel that much better. A small amount to me can be life changing to someone else.
I wish I could do more.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves. Entrepreneurs can have a conscience too!
lender.occupational_info: I helped build www.getitnext.com to help people save money shopping on the internet.

lender.name: Donayt
lender.loan_because: We have so much to offer yet give so little. It is time we helped to make a change in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Donayt is a search engine that allows internet users everywhere to make a difference. Spread the word and help Donayt change the world.
